cause.description:
For those of you who know and love someone with schizophrenia lets get to the bottom of the problem... we know very little about this illness. All we know is how crippling it can be to a person and their loved ones.
I have a brother who suffers from this illness and I myself suffer from it. I would love to see more research done on the topic. Also I would love to see more awareness raised on this issue. I met so many people that have not got a clue what schizophrenia even is. and its not easy to explain. I have posted 3 video on the topic she has cover the topic very well i feel.
1. find better treatment methods for schizophrenia
2. Find a cure
3. Understand what causes this illness
cause.name: Schizophrenia Research
